message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can take the smaller share, I'll take the bigger one. It's a good deal for you!
I'll take a slightly bigger share, but still fair and reasonable!
You're being greedy, take this and we can end this!
I'm willing to compromise, let's meet in the middle again!
Fine, we'll go back to the original 50/50 split. It's the least we can do at this point!
